CLDY_Chevron_Bar__c.label: Status
CLDY_Chevron_Bar__c.formula:
IF(AND( ISPICKVAL( Apttus__Status_Category__c , "Request"),ISNULL(TEXT(Apttus__Status__c) )) ,IMAGE("/resource/CLDLYRecord", "Agreement_Chevron_Draft", 60, 800)
,IF( ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status_Category__c, "Request") ,IMAGE("/resource/CLDLYRecord", "Agreement_Chevron_Request", 60,800)
,IF( ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status__c, "Author Contract") ,IMAGE("/resource/CLDLYGenerated", "Agreement_Chevron_Generated", 60,800)
,IF( ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status__c, "Other Party Review") ,IMAGE("/resource/CLDLYInReview", "Agreement_Chevron_InReview", 60,800)
,IF( ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status__c, "Awaiting Approval") ,IMAGE("/resource/CLDLYInApproval", "Agreement_Chevron_AwaitingApproval", 70,800)
,IF( ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status__c, "Approved") ,IMAGE("/resource/CLDYApproved", "Agreement_Chevron_Approved", 60,800)
,IF( ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status__c, "Rejected") ,IMAGE("/resource/CLDYRejected", "Agreement_Chevron_Rejected", 60,800)
,IF( ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status__c, "Other Party Signatures") ,IMAGE("/resource/CLDLYInSignatures", "Agreement_Chevron_InSignatures", 60, 800)
,IF( ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status__c, "Fully Signed") ,IMAGE("/resource/CLDLYFullySigned", "Agreement_Chevron_FullySigned", 60, 800)
,IF( ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status__c, "Activated") ,IMAGE("/resource/CLDLYActivated", "Agreement_Chevron_Activated", 60, 800),IMAGE("/resource/CLDLYRecord", "Agreement_Chevron_General", 60, 800)))))))))))

attachSalesInvoicePdf__c.label: Attach Sales Invoice PDF
attachSalesInvoicePdf__c.formula: "&solmgr=1" + "&id=" + Id + "&QueryId=[SIPT1]0Q_571UAM623607,[SIIG]0Q_572UAM623607,[SILIG]0Q_573UAM623607,[SID]0Q_574UAM623607,[SIVTC]0Q_575UAM623607,[SIDST]0Q_576UAM623607,[SIPT4]0Q_577UAM623607,[SIILI]0Q_578UAM623607,[SIDST3]0Q_579UAM623607,[SICF]0Q_580UAM623607,[SIPT5]0Q_581UAM623607,[SIPT3]0Q_582UAM623607,[SIA]0Q_583UAM623607,[SIDST4]0Q_584UAM623607,[SILI]0Q_585UAM623607,[SIPT2]0Q_586UAM623607,[SIDST2]0Q_587UAM623607,[SIDSV]0Q_588UAM623607,[SIDTL]0Q_589UAM623607,[SILIC]0Q_590UAM623607,[SICTC1]0Q_591UAM623607,[SICTC2]0Q_592UAM623607,[SIWTDTL]0Q_593UAM623629,[SIQR]0Q_594UAM623629" + "&DefaultPDF=1" + "&DS7=1" + "&TemplateId=" + ffaci__CongaTemplate__c + "&DV0=" + IF ( ISPICKVAL(c2g__InvoiceStatus__c, "Complete"), "", "Draft") + "&CurrencyCulture=" + ffaci__CurrencyCulture__c + "&DV1=" + ffaci__CurrencyCulture__c + "&qmode=Attachments" + "&OFN=CSR_" + Name

emailRemittance__c.label: Email Remittance
emailRemittance__c.formula: "&solmgr=1" + "&id=" + Id + "&QueryId=[PRemD]0Q_479UAM516313?pv0=" + c2g__Payment__c + "~pv1=" + c2g__Account__c + ",[PRE]0Q_480UAM516313,[PRT]0Q_481UAM516313,[RemET]0Q_482UAM516313" + "&DefaultPDF=1" + "&TemplateId={QVar1}" + "&OFN=Remittance" + "&CurrencyCulture=" + ffaci__CurrencyCulture__c + "&EmailToId=" + ffaci__RemittanceEmail__c + "&EmailSubject=Remittances" + "&CongaEmailTemplateId={QVar0}" + "&DV0=" + ffaci__CurrencyCulture__c + "&QVAR0Id=a2FRo000004xg7S" + "&QVAR1Id=a2FRo000004xg7T" + "&UF0=1" + "&UF1=1" + "&MFTSValue0=1" + "&MFTS0=c2g__RemittancesEmailed__c" + "&MFTSValue1=" + TEXT(NOW()) + "&MFTS1=c2g__RemittancesEmailedDate__c" + "&qmode=SendEmail"

FFX_APVoucher__c.inlineHelpText: AP Voucher the created this Payable Invoice.

ExternalDocumentNumber__c.label: External Document Number
ExternalDocumentNumber__c.description: The sequence number of the transaction.
ExternalDocumentNumber__c.inlineHelpText: The sequence number of the transaction. If you are using this field, you can add it to the CashMatchingOtherTransactions field set on Transaction Line Item to aid in identifying documents.

Data_Quality_Description__c.label: Data Quality Description
Data_Quality_Description__c.formula: IF( Data_Quality_Score__c =100,"All Campaign Details Captured", "Missing: "&IF( LEN( Name)<5,"Meaningful Campaign Name, ","")&""&IF(ISPICKVAL( Type ,""), "Type, ","")&""&IF( ISPICKVAL( Status ,""), "Status, ","")&""&IF( LEN(TEXT(MONTH( StartDate )))=0, "Start Date, ","")&""&IF( LEN(TEXT(MONTH( EndDate )))=0, "End Date, ","")&""&IF(NumberOfContacts + NumberOfLeads = 0, "No Associated Members, ","")&""&IF( LEN(TEXT( ExpectedRevenue ))=0, "Expected Revenue",""))

Data_Quality_Score__c.label: Data Quality Score
Data_Quality_Score__c.formula: IF(LEN( Name ) < 5, 0,20) + IF(ISPICKVAL( Type ,"" ), 0,20) + IF(ISPICKVAL( Status ,"" ), 0,20) + IF(LEN( TEXT(MONTH( StartDate )))= 0, 0,10) + IF( LEN(TEXT(MONTH( EndDate ))) = 0, 0,10) + IF( NumberOfContacts + NumberOfLeads = 0, 0,10) + IF( LEN( TEXT( ExpectedRevenue ) ) = 0, 0,10)

Case_Priority__c.label: Case Priority
Case_Priority__c.formula:
IF(
OR(ISPICKVAL(Production_environment__c, "No"),
AND( NOT(ISPICKVAL(Severity_Level__c, "Unable to work")), ISPICKVAL( Affected_Users_Count__c , "One user or workstation")),
AND( ISPICKVAL(Account.Support_Team__c, "EDMS"), ISPICKVAL(Severity_Level__c, "Able to utilize a work-around with no business impact")),
AND( ISPICKVAL(Account.Support_Team__c, "EDMS"), ISPICKVAL(Affected_Users_Count__c, "One user or workstation")),
AND( ISPICKVAL(Account.Support_Team__c, "EDMS"), ISPICKVAL(Affected_Users_Count__c, "A group of users"), ISPICKVAL(Severity_Level__c, "Able to utilize a work-around with no business impact")),
AND( ISPICKVAL( Origin, "Email" ), BEGINS( OwnerId, "00G" ))),
"Low",
IF(AND(
NOT(ISPICKVAL( Affected_Users_Count__c , "One user or workstation")),
AND(ISPICKVAL(Account.Support_Team__c, "EDMS"), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Affected_Users_Count__c, "A group of users"))),
ISPICKVAL(Severity_Level__c, "Unable to work")),
"High",
IF(AND(
ISPICKVAL(Affected_Users_Count__c , "Entire site or all users"),
NOT(ISPICKVAL(Account.Support_Team__c, "EDMS")),
NOT(ISPICKVAL(Severity_Level__c, "Able to utilize a work-around with no business impact"))),
"High",
"Medium")))

Count_of_Forms_Design_Emails__c.label: Count of Forms Design Emails
Count_of_Forms_Design_Emails__c.description: Counts the number of times a forms escalation has been sent to the Forms Design team for the case.

Data_Quality_Description__c.label: Data Quality Description
Data_Quality_Description__c.formula: IF( Data_Quality_Score__c =100,"All Case Details Captured", "Missing: "&IF( ISPICKVAL( Status,""),"Status, ","")&""&IF(ISPICKVAL( Type ,""), "Type, ","")&""&IF( ISPICKVAL( Origin ,""), "Origin, ","")&""&IF( ISPICKVAL( Reason ,""), "Reason, ","")&""&IF( ISPICKVAL( Priority ,""), "Priority, ","")&""&IF( LEN( Subject )<5, "Meaningful Subject Line","")&""&IF( OR(LEN(ContactId)=0,LEN( AccountId)=0), "Associated Account and Contact",""))

Data_Quality_Score__c.label: Data Quality Score
Data_Quality_Score__c.formula: IF( OR(LEN(ContactId)=0,LEN( AccountId)=0), 0,10) + IF( ISPICKVAL( Status ,""), 0,15) + IF( ISPICKVAL( Type ,""), 0,15) + IF( ISPICKVAL( Origin ,""), 0,15) + IF( ISPICKVAL( Reason ,""), 0,15) + IF(ISPICKVAL(Priority, ""),0,15) + IF(LEN( Subject )<5,0,15)

"All Contact Details Captured",
IF( ISBLANK( Email ), "Missing Email. ", "" ) & IF( ISBLANK( Title ), "Missing Title. ", "" ) & IF( ISBLANK( Phone ), "Missing Phone. ", "" ) & IF( ISBLANK( Job_Role__c ), "Missing Job Role. ", "" ) & IF( ISBLANK( Program_Area__c ), "Missing Program Area. ", "" ))

Data_Quality_Description__c.label: Data Quality Description
Data_Quality_Description__c.formula: IF( Data_Quality_Score__c =100,"All Contract Details Captured", "Missing: "&IF( LEN( TEXT(MONTH( StartDate ))) = 0, "Contract Start Date, ","")&""&IF(LEN( TEXT(ContractTerm)) = 0, "Contract Term, ","")&""&IF( LEN( BillingCity ) = 0, "Complete Contract Address, ","")&""&IF(LEN( CustomerSignedId ) = 0, "Customer Signature, ","")&""&IF( ISPICKVAL( OwnerExpirationNotice ,""), "Owner Expiration Notice",""))

Data_Quality_Score__c.label: Data Quality Score
Data_Quality_Score__c.formula: IF( LEN(TEXT(MONTH(StartDate)))=0, 0,20) + IF( LEN(TEXT( ContractTerm ))=0, 0,20) + IF( LEN( BillingCity ) = 0, 0,20) + IF( LEN( CustomerSignedId) = 0, 0,20) + IF( ISPICKVAL( OwnerExpirationNotice ,""), 0,20)

PicklistName__c.label: PicklistName

Data_Quality_Description__c.label: Data Quality Description
Data_Quality_Description__c.formula: IF( Data_Quality_Score__c = 100, "All data is complete." , IF( ISBLANK( Keywords__c ), "Missing Keywords. ", "" ) & IF( LEN( Title ) < 11, "Missing Title.", "" ) )

Data_Quality_Score__c.label: Data Quality Score
Data_Quality_Score__c.formula: IF( ISBLANK( Keywords__c ), 0, 50 ) + IF( LEN( Title ) < 11, 0, 50 )

Internal_Use_Only__c.label: Internal Use Only
Internal_Use_Only__c.description: To signal this is only for internal use.

Review_Status__c.label: Review Status
Review_Status__c.description: To show where the KBA stands in the review approval process.

Data_Quality_Description__c.label: Data Quality Description
Data_Quality_Description__c.formula: IF( Data_Quality_Score__c =100,"All Lead Details Captured", "Missing: "&IF( LEN( FirstName)=0,"First Name, ","")&""&IF(LEN(LastName)=0, "Last Name, ","")&""&IF( LEN(Company)=0, "Company, ","")&""&IF( LEN(Phone)=0, "Phone, ","")&""&IF( ISPICKVAL(Salutation,""), "Salutation, ","")&""&IF( ISPICKVAL(Rating,""), "Rating, ","")&""&IF( LEN(City)=0, "Complete Address, ","")&""&IF( LEN(Email)=0, "Email",""))

Data_Quality_Score__c.label: Data Quality Score
Data_Quality_Score__c.formula: IF(LEN( FirstName ) = 0, 0,15) + IF(LEN( LastName ) = 0, 0,15) + IF(LEN( Company ) = 0, 0,15) + IF(LEN( Phone ) = 0, 0,15) + IF( ISPICKVAL( Salutation,""), 0,10) + IF( ISPICKVAL(Rating,""), 0,10) + IF( LEN( City ) = 0, 0,10) + IF( LEN( Email ) = 0, 0,10)

Data_Quality_Description__c.label: Data Quality Description
Data_Quality_Description__c.formula:
IF( Data_Quality_Score__c =100, "All Opportunity Details Captured",
IF( ISBLANK( Primary_Contact__c ), "Missing Primary Contact. ", "" ) & IF( ISPICKVAL( Support_Level__c, "" ), "Missing Support Level. ", "" ) & IF( ISPICKVAL( Program_Area__c, "" ), "Missing Program Area. " , "" ) & IF( ISPICKVAL( Account_Type__c , "" ), "Missing Account Type. ", "" ) & IF( ISPICKVAL( LeadSource , "" ), "Missing Lead Source. ", "" ) & IF( ISPICKVAL( Lead_Sub_Source__c, "" ), "Missing Lead Sub Source. ", "" ) & IF( ISBLANK( Billing_Contact__c ), "Missing Billing Contact. ", "" ))

Data_Quality_Score__c.label: Data Quality Score
Data_Quality_Score__c.formula: IF( ISBLANK( Primary_Contact__c ), 0, 20 ) + IF( ISPICKVAL( Support_Level__c, "" ), 0, 10 ) + IF( ISPICKVAL( Program_Area__c, "" ), 0, 20 ) + IF( ISPICKVAL( Account_Type__c , "" ), 0, 10 ) + IF( ISPICKVAL( LeadSource , "" ), 0, 10 ) + IF( ISPICKVAL( Lead_Sub_Source__c, "" ), 0, 10 ) + IF( ISBLANK( Billing_Contact__c ), 0, 20 )

Referred_By_Customer__c.inlineHelpText: Enter the name of the customer that referred this opportunity to us.

Straight_Line_Adjustment__c.label: Straight Line Adjustment
Straight_Line_Adjustment__c.description: To be used by Finance to adjust ARR according to discounts given out. This will only affect Traverse products.
Straight_Line_Adjustment__c.inlineHelpText: Enter amount to adjust the annual ARR for this renewal to be in line with any discounts. This only applies to Traverse products, if this is needed for Appointments or Compass Products contact the Enterprise Apps team.

Support_Item__c.label: Support Item
Support_Item__c.description: Should be only support product from product catalog

Top_66__c.label: Top 66
Top_66__c.formula: IF( OR(ISPICKVAL(Account.Agency_Type__c,"Gvt State"), AND(ISPICKVAL(Account.Agency_Type__c,"Gvt Local"), Account.Population__c >1000000) ),TRUE, FALSE)

Traverse_Revenue_Adjusted__c.label: Traverse Revenue Adjusted
Traverse_Revenue_Adjusted__c.description: This field takes the Traverse Revenue and adds the Straight Line Adjustment. This will be used in the roll-up for Traverse ARR on account

Traverse_Revenue__c.label: Traverse Revenue
Traverse_Revenue__c.description: Roll Up Summary of all Money from Traverse family

Unit_Price__c.label: Unit Price
Unit_Price__c.description: Will pull from tier, but can be overridden at the early stages of the process.

Yearly_Appointments_Revenue__c.label: Yearly Appointments Revenue
Yearly_Appointments_Revenue__c.description: This field looks at the Contract Terms and if 3 multiplies the Appointments Revenue roll-up by 4, otherwise returns Appointments Revenue

Yearly_Compass_Revenue__c.label: Yearly Compass Revenue
Yearly_Compass_Revenue__c.description: This field looks at the Contract Terms and if 3 multiplies the Compass Revenue roll-up by 4, otherwise returns Compass Revenue

Yearly_Traverse_Revenue__c.label: Yearly Traverse Revenue
Yearly_Traverse_Revenue__c.description: This field looks at the Contract Terms and if 3 multiplies the Traverse Revenue roll-up by 4, otherwise returns Traverse Revenue

Parent_Opportunity_Product_ID__c.label: Parent Opportunity Product ID
Parent_Opportunity_Product_ID__c.description: Caches record ID of opportunity line item that created it. Necessary for related support item flow.

Product_Family__c.label: Product Family
Product_Family__c.description: Used to Capture Product Family from the Product on Opportunity Product for Roll Up Summaries in Pricing Breakouts

Total_Price__c.label: Total-Price
Total_Price__c.formula: IF( AND(ISPICKVAL( Product_Family__c , "Traverse" ),ISPICKVAL( Revenue_Category__c , "NW SaaS" )) , UnitPrice , (UnitPrice * Quantity) )

FFX_PSR_CurrentWeek_End_Date__c.label: PSR Current Week Ending Date
FFX_PSR_CurrentWeek_End_Date__c.formula: CASE( MOD(TODAY() - DATE(1900, 1, 7), 7), 1, Today()-1, 2, Today()-2, 3, Today()-3, 4, Today()-4, 5, Today()-5, 6, Today()-6, 0, Today()-7, NULL)

FFX_PSR_FinancialsStatus__c.label: PSR Financials Status
FFX_PSR_FinancialsStatus__c.inlineHelpText: Please enter the financial status of the project for this week's ending date for inclusion in the weekly status report.

FFX_PSR_LastWeek_Ending_Date__c.label: PSR Last Week Ending Date
FFX_PSR_LastWeek_Ending_Date__c.formula: CASE( MOD(TODAY() - DATE(1900, 1, 7), 7), 1, Today()-8, 2, Today()-9, 3, Today()-10, 4, Today()-11, 5, Today()-12, 6, Today()-13, 0, Today()-14, NULL)

FFX_PSR_NextWeek_Ending_Date__c.label: PSR Next Week Ending Date
FFX_PSR_NextWeek_Ending_Date__c.formula: CASE( MOD(TODAY() - DATE(1900, 1, 7), 7), 1, Today()+6, 2, Today()+5, 3, Today()+4, 4, Today()+3, 5, Today()+2, 6, Today()+1, 0, Today(), NULL)

FFX_PSR_ScheduleStatus__c.inlineHelpText: Please enter the schedule status for the week ending date for inclusion in the weekly status report.

FFX_Planner_Color__c.label: Planner Color
FFX_Planner_Color__c.description: Field used on Planners to show color coding.
FFX_Planner_Color__c.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(pse__Project__r.pse__Billing_Type__c, "Time and Materials") && ISPICKVAL(pse__Project__r.pse__Project_Type__c, "Customer Project") , "lightyellow", IF( ISPICKVAL(pse__Project__r.pse__Billing_Type__c, "Fixed Price") && ISPICKVAL(pse__Project__r.pse__Project_Type__c, "Customer Project"), "Turquoise", ""))

FFX_Resource_Request_Type__c.label: Resource Request Type
FFX_Resource_Request_Type__c.description: Distinguish the type of resource request.
FFX_Resource_Request_Type__c.inlineHelpText: Distinguish the type of resource request.

FFX_PSR_Total_Billable_Hours__c.label: PSR Total Billable Hours
FFX_PSR_Total_Billable_Hours__c.formula: IF( pse__Billable__c ,1, 0) * ( pse__Saturday_Hours__c + pse__Sunday_Hours__c + pse__Monday_Hours__c + pse__Tuesday_Hours__c + pse__Wednesday_Hours__c + pse__Thursday_Hours__c + pse__Friday_Hours__c )

FFX_Remaining_Capacity_Hours__c.label: Remaining Capacity Hours
FFX_Remaining_Capacity_Hours__c.formula: IF(pse__Calendar_Hours__c=0, 0, (pse__Calendar_Hours__c - pse__Assigned_Billable_Hours__c - pse__Assigned_Excluded_Hours__c - pse__Assigned_Credited_Hours__c - pse__Assigned_Non_Billable_Hours__c - pse__Held_Hours__c - pse__Unheld_Hours__c))

Approval_Status__c.description: To help setup validation rules that will keep edits of the quote line items once a quote is in approval.

Initial_Cost_Estimate__c.description: This takes the sum of NW SW, NW SW Maint., NW SaaS and NW Labor

FFX_MultiAssetsPerAPVLine__c.description: Create X Assets per AP Voucher Line, where X is the Quantity Invoiced
FFX_MultiAssetsPerAPVLine__c.inlineHelpText: Create X Assets per AP Voucher Line, where X is the Quantity Invoiced, If this checkbox is not checked, then the system will create a single asset, If checked, it will create the number of assets specified in the quantity on the AP Voucher Line

Data_Quality_Description__c.label: Data Quality Description
Data_Quality_Description__c.formula: IF( Data_Quality_Score__c = 100, "All data filled out." , IF( ISPICKVAL( Allocation_Type__c , "" ) , "Missing Allocation Type. " , "" ) & IF( ISPICKVAL( Status__c , "" ) , "Missing Status. " , "" ) & IF( ISBLANK( Remaining_Terms__c ), "Missing Initial Terms." , "" ))

Data_Quality_Score__c.label: Data Quality Score
Data_Quality_Score__c.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL( Allocation_Type__c , "" ), 0, 33 ) + IF( ISBLANK( Remaining_Terms__c ) , 0 , 33 ) + IF( ISPICKVAL( Status__c , "" ), 0, 34 )
